mapper.insert: insert into sys_dept (id_, dept_name, parent_id, sort_no, leaf_, enable_, remark_, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leaf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sys_dept set dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_no = #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, leaf_ = #{leaf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enable_ = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, remark_ = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id_, dept_name, parent_id, sort_no, leaf_, enable_, remark_, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_dept where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id_, dept_name, parent_id, sort_no, leaf_, enable_, remark_, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_dept
